Methodology


Audio Transcription with Whisper

Purpose:

  • Convert spoken audio into text for further analysis.

Steps:

  • Use OpenAI Whisper to transcribe audio files into textual format.
  • Save the transcribed text for subsequent analysis.


Diarization using GPT-4O

Purpose:

  • Identify and separate speakers in the conversation transcript.

Steps:

  • Utilize GPT-4O to perform diarization, distinguishing between different speakers in the conversation.
  • Assign each segment of text to its respective speaker for personalized analysis.


Sentiment Analysis

Purpose:

  • Determine the overall sentiment (positive, negative, neutral) of each speaker.

Steps:

  • Apply sentiment analysis techniques to assess the emotional tone conveyed by each speaker.
  • Use techniques like natural language processing (NLP) to quantify sentiment scores.


Tone Analysis

Purpose:

  • Identify various tones (informative, cooperative, assertive, etc.) exhibited by speakers.

Steps:

  • Implement tone analysis algorithms to categorize the communication styles of each speaker.
  • Extract tone indicators from the conversation to understand nuances in communication.


Emotion Analysis

Purpose:

  • Recognize and quantify emotions (happy, sad, angry, etc.) expressed by speakers.

Steps:

  • Use emotional analysis tools to detect and measure emotional states throughout the conversation.
  • Translate emotional cues into data points for deeper insights into speaker emotions.


Language Aspects Identification

Purpose:

  • Identify linguistic elements such as slang, jargon, idioms, acronyms, and profanity.

Steps:

  • Employ linguistic analysis techniques to pinpoint language-specific features used by speakers.
  • Catalogue and analyze language aspects to understand contextual usage in conversation.


Chatbot Development for RAG

Purpose:

  • Create a chatbot capable of generating responses based on retrieved information.

Steps:

  • Use retrieved conversation data to train a chatbot model for retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
  • Implement RAG techniques to generate responses that are contextually relevant to user queries.


Integration and Application

Integration:

  • Integrate the various analyses and chatbot functionalities into a cohesive system.
  • Ensure seamless interaction between components to facilitate efficient data processing and user interaction.

Application:

  • Apply the integrated system to analyze and derive insights from conversations in business contexts.
  • Utilize generated insights for decision-making, customer interaction improvement, and operational efficiency.
